725049f-a.text:
18th Street, north from 27th Avenue. Note in the background the tower of the Triborough Bridge and the arc of the Hellgate Bridge. 18th Street was formerly Willow Street.
P. L. Sperr  June 12, 1935

725161f-a.text:
27th Avenue, at the N.E. corner of 18th Street, showing an old frame house with stucco front. It is used as a steamship ticket office by N. and M. Daddario.
P. L. Sperr  June 12, 1935
